CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 26, 1951, pg. 27 reads: "Vann School Chorus - When Vann School pupils presented the play, "Puck Drops In," in school auditorium Tuesday for the benefit of the Parent-Teachers Association, this chorus sang the opening number "Zing Zing." Among those in the chorus were Carol Crawford, Eleanor Crawford, Betty Ferguson, Joylette Johnson, Eleanor Jones, Lorraine Jones, Emma Morphis, Mollie Sharpe and Verdine Staton. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Chorus, including Carol Crawford, Eleanor Crawford, Betty Ferguson, Joylette Johnson, Eleanor Jones, Lorraine Jones, Emma Morphis, Mollie Sharpe, and Verdine Staton, singing in play "Puck Drops In" in Robert L Vann Elementary School
